name: Slider
description: The Slider class is a native Minecraft UI widget that provides a draggable slider control for selecting numeric values within a configurable range. It supports keyboard navigation, mouse interaction, and real-time value updates with event callbacks. This class is the underlying implementation used by SliderWidgetHelper for creating slider controls in custom JSMacros screens.
overview: The Slider class provides core slider functionality with: Draggable Handle, Keyboard Support, Visual Feedback, Step-based Values, Event Callbacks, Bounds Checking, and Customizable Appearance.

constructors.signature: new Slider(x, y, width, height, text, value, action, steps)
constructors.description: Creates a new Slider with full configuration options.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the slider in pixels

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the slider in pixels (typically 20)

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Display text for the slider label

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Initial value (0.0 to 1.0, will be rounded)

constructors.signature: new Slider(x, y, width, height, text, value, action)
constructors.description: Creates a new Slider with default 2 steps (minimum and maximum).

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the slider in pixels

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the slider in pixels (typically 20)

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Display text for the slider label

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Initial value (0.0 to 1.0, will be rounded)

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the current value of the slider (0.0 to 1.0).
examples:
const currentValue = slider.getValue();
Chat.log(`Current slider value: ${currentValue}`);

methods.name: setValue
methods.description: Sets the slider value and triggers the action callback if the value changes.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: New value (will be clamped and rounded to nearest step)

methods.name: roundValue
methods.description: Rounds a value to the nearest valid step position.

methods.name: getSteps
methods.description: Returns the total number of steps for the slider.
examples:
const totalSteps = slider.getSteps();
Chat.log(`Slider has ${totalSteps} steps`);

methods.name: setSteps
methods.description: Sets the number of steps for the slider.

methods.name: setMessage
methods.description: Sets the slider's display text using a string.

methods.name: setMessage
methods.description: Sets the slider's display text using a Text object.
